alert.note: Alert for Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 1:51PM CDT until May 21 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... North central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 151 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles east of Cottonwood, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Dothan, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Malone, Avon, Gordon, Bascom, Pansey, Crosby, Grangeburg, Sigma, Pearce, Enon, Lovetown, Wilson Mill, Barber and Chattahoochee SP. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
